game.name: My Singing Monsters
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 앱 내 구매
game.shortDescription: Dive into the Musical World of My Singing Monsters! Breed them, feed them, listen to them sing! Breed & collect a menagerie of Monsters, each a living instrument! Build your paradise across 35+ Islands, customize your world, and enjoy endless music! There's never a dull moment in the Monster World!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into the Musical World of My Singing Monsters! Breed them, feed them, listen to them sing! Breed & collect a menagerie of Monsters, each a living instrument! Build your paradise across 35+ Islands, customize your world, and enjoy endless music! There's never a dull moment in the Monster World!

reviewHighlights.text: 한글판이 있던 초딩 때 ㅈㄴ 재밌게 했던 추억의 게임 최근에 복귀해서 재밌게 즐기는 중
솔직히 노래도 좋고 캐릭터도 개성있게 생겼고 한정 캐릭터 모으는 재미도있어서 G.O.T.E 겜 인정임요
